attributes.action: Pay child benefit for only the first and second child of all new and future pregnancies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In a world where overpopulation could be considered the biggest threat to our planet and a major factor in climate change should we really be paying UK citizens to have more than two children?
Capping child benefit after the second born child will act as a deterrent to "benefits families" to whom an extra child is currently an extra income.

This is not about the right to have children but about limiting the encouragement currently given to many to have large families.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
